definition: scissors/shears/clippers/CL:把[ba3]/to cut with scissors/to trim/to wipe out or exterminate
to receive/to answer (the phone)/to meet or welcome sb/to connect/to catch/to join/to extend/to take one's turn on duty/to take over for sb

sentences.english: Did you start editing before having completed shooting three films?
sentences.chinese: 您在三部片子殺青前就開始剪接了嗎？

sentences.english: Cleantech entrepreneurs are splicing genes in the search for greener fuels.
sentences.chinese: 清潔技術企業家在爲綠色燃料搜索剪接基因。

sentences.english: I still love cutting on film.
Most of these alternative splices were supported by two or more transcripts.
sentences.chinese: 大多數選擇性剪接都爲兩個和多個轉錄本所支持。

sentences.english: Our study of the NTC complex and its associated components provides deep insights into the mechanism of spliceosome assembly.
sentences.chinese: 這些研究讓我們對剪接體組合的機制有更深層了了解。

sentences.english: Recording some video from game, hope it can make you smile.
sentences.chinese: 錄下的一些遊戲影片剪接而成，望能博君一笑。

sentences.english: The fusion transcript becomes a mature functional transcript after intergenic splicing.
sentences.chinese: 融合轉錄本經基因間剪接而成爲有功能的成熟轉錄本。

sentences.english: By the way, that's called a comma splice .
sentences.chinese: 順便說一下，這是所謂的“逗號剪接。

sentences.english: Self-splicing introns that use a free guanylate nucleotide in the splicing mechanism.
sentences.chinese: 自我剪接型內含子，在剪接過程中使用鳥苷酸。

sentences.english: Self-splicing introns that use a free guanylate nucleotide in the splicing mechanism.
sentences.chinese: 自我剪接型內含子，在剪接過程中使用鳥苷酸。

definition: fragment (of speech etc)/extract (from book etc)/episode (of story etc)
sound track/track number (e.g. on a CD)
opening titles (of movie)/leader (blank film at the beginning and end of a reel)
to cut (from a movie etc)/to censor
to write and direct (a play, film etc)/playwright-director/choreographer-director/scenarist-director
